text:
[SEEKING] | Contract | Full-time

Hello peeps, I’m on the last 20 days on my contract which means that is time to move on!

I work as a senior full stack web developer specialising mainly in application development using Ruby & JavaScript. Ember has been a great asset on my development toolkit and I would like to keep it that way :smile: 

I’m happy to provide references, code samples, etc upon request. Please ping me at <mailto:mario@hyperdrive.is|mario@hyperdrive.is> or on slack for more information
